levels.description: Immediately puts up to <@ba.vup>{max_target}</> enemies within Attack Range to <$ba.sleep>Sleep</> for <@ba.vup>{sleep}</> seconds. Upon waking up, all enemies in their vicinity are dealt <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Arts damage
